description: Creates or updates the permissions policy for your registry. A registry policy is used to specify permissions for another Amazon Web Services account and is used when configuring cross-account replication. For more information, see Registry permissions in the Amazon Elastic Container Registry User Guide.

parameters.name: policyText
parameters.description: The JSON policy text to apply to your registry. The policy text follows the same format as IAM policy text. For more information, see Registry permissions in the Amazon Elastic Container Registry User Guide.

nested_items.name: registryId
nested_items.description: The registry ID associated with the request.

nested_items.name: policyText
nested_items.description: The JSON policy text for your registry.
